tasks.label: Run: Supervisor (foreground)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path '.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe') { Write-Host 'Activate .venv and run: python SupervisorAgent\\supervisor.py' } else { Write-Host 'Create .venv: python -m venv .venv'; Write-Host 'Install deps: pip install -r SupervisorAgent\\requirements.txt'; Write-Host 'Then run: python SupervisorAgent\\supervisor.py' }"
